ygData.subject: Need Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: The following may not be ethical to some of you but oh well.. :-) I have been lacking in time lately to play my bard.. he is level 23. I have some high level
ygData.messageBody:
The following may not be ethical to some of you but oh well.. :-)

I have been lacking in time lately to play my bard.. he is level 23. I have some high level friends
who have offered to power me up some. They are all late 20's to mid 30's.

Question is what to kill and where? Any suggestions? As in what gives great XP that with the help of
a level 29 Druid or level 35 Shaman can I kill?

Thanks in advance

Ranian Aeleroth
